Package ohos.global.i18n

Class LocaleHelperUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.i18n.LocaleHelperUtils

  • public abstract class LocaleHelperUtils
extends Object
    A helper class for utilities used to obtain locale information.
    Since:
    3

      static String replaceCountryName​(Locale locale, Locale displayLocale, String display)
      Checks and replaces the currently displayed country or region name based on the specific rules for the locale whose country or region name is to be replaced and the locale for which the country or region name is to be displayed.

        public static ArrayList<Locale> getBlockedLangs​(Context context)
        Obtains a list of languages that are inappropriate for display in the current locale.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the context to use.
        Returns:
        Returns the languages inappropriate to the current locale.

      • replaceCountryName

        public static String replaceCountryName​(Locale locale,
                                        Locale displayLocale,
                                        String display)
        Checks and replaces the currently displayed country or region name based on the specific rules for the locale whose country or region name is to be replaced and the locale for which the country or region name is to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        locale - Indicates the locale whose country or region name is to be replaced.
        displayLocale - Indicates the locale for which to the country or region name is to be displayed.
        display - Indicates the currently displayed country or region name.
        Returns:
        Returns the country or region name replaced based on the specific rules if met; returns the currently displayed country or region name otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getCountryName

        public static String getCountryName​(Locale locale,
                                    Locale displayLocale,
                                    boolean sentenceCase)
        Obtains the region name localized for display in a given locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - Indicates the locale whose region name will be displayed.
        displayLocale - Indicates the locale for which to display the region name.
        sentenceCase - Specifies whether the region name is displayed in sentence case. The value true indicates the sentence case, and false indicates another case style.
        Returns:
        Returns the localized region name.
        Since:
        4

      • getCountryName

        Parameters:

        displayLocale - Indicates the locale for which to display the region name.
        Returns:

        Since:
        4

      • getLanguageName

        public static String getLanguageName​(Locale locale,
                                     Locale displayLocale,
                                     boolean sentenceCase)
        Obtains the language name localized for display in a given locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - Indicates the locale whose country name will be displayed.
        displayLocale - Indicates the locale for which to display the country name.
        sentenceCase - Specifies whether the language name is displayed in sentence case. The value true indicates the sentence case, and false indicates another case style.
        Returns:
        Returns the localized language name.
        Since:
        4
